Text:
First, there is no rank of Specialist in the Marines.  Secondly, according to the American media the killing isn't about our American military - its about sectarian parties killing each other and any bystander caught in between.

I would also like to point out that another option that would get US soldiers - just like Saddam had options to keep them out - is for you to take notice that your country voted for a government, voted for representatives, and continue to try to lead a somewhat normal life with hopes that people like you will quit taking their life for your cause.
smoovement is apparently uninformed from the fucking get-go- "according to American Media" what a fucking retard.
